title: Reuters reveals U.S. rethinks steps on China tariffs in wake of Taiwan response
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters exclusively reported that China’s war games around Taiwan have led Biden administration officials to recalibrate their thinking on whether […]

The post Reuters reveals U.S. rethinks steps on China tariffs in wake of Taiwan response appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively reported that China’s war games around Taiwan have led Biden administration officials to recalibrate their thinking on whether to scrap some tariffs or potentially impose others on Beijing, setting those options aside for now. The tariffs make Chinese imports more expensive for U.S. companies, which, in turn, make products cost morefor consumers.

The post Reuters reveals U.S. rethinks steps on China tariffs in wake of Taiwan response appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
